Okey so basically a fat otaku neet get's into a fight with the neighbours kid cause he kicked a ball towards his face and starts lecturing the kid and shouting at him. Mom turns up and takes the side of her kid which the fat guy get's mad at cause she won't believe him. He then even get's kicked out of his own house told that he can't keep leeching of them and then is turned into a little kid. Mom and kid walks by and see's him and asks if he's alright and he tells them he was kicked out of his house cause they didn't want him anymore. Mom feels bad for him and takes him home then takes him to the bath to clean him up and well it's pretty obvious he get's a boner mom get's a bit flustered and say's it's a normal reaction which then he starts to hump her and she reluctantly agree's to let him do it again so he won't tell anyone what happened.

Then they get out of the bath, otaku tells the kid he's the otaku and was turned into a kid and will have his revenge. Kid get's mad but otaku instantly runs to the mom crying that the kid hit him and he's so sad with everything happening. The mom takes his side and the kid tries to tell the mom he's the otaku but she won't believe him cause who would? Then they are about to go to sleep otaku cries he's never been allowed to touch his mommies bobbies, mom for some reason goes okey then you can touch mine. He starts to molest her and she eventually starts to get horny while telling him to stop. He then demands to have sex with her but she refuses and he scoffs that if she doesn't do as he say's he'll tell everyone she tried to rape him cause who would they believe? Then it just goes on with him raping the mom pretty much while laughing like a crazy person telling her he'll break their family apart bla bla bla then he pretty much just goes I'll get my revenge on everyone!
